attributes.action: Televise Huddersfield Town v Man City !
attributes.background: As we know Hudderfield Town got drawn against Manchester City in the FA cup ! Not all Terries and mini Terriers will be able to get tickets and won't even be able to watch it on TV because it's not been chosen to be televised ! Get this petition signed and get it on TV ! UTT 🔵⚪️

rejection.details: This is a matter for the broadcasters and the FA to decide.
